explains: adj. 上述的；前面提及的

sentences.en: This is the draft of a declaration that will be issued at the end of the aforementioned U.N. conference.
sentences.cn: 这是将在上述联合国会议结束时发布的宣言的草稿。

sentences.en: The aforementioned person was seen acting suspiciously.
sentences.cn: 有人看见前面提到的那个人行动可疑。

sentences.en: I like to add it to cereal, oatmeal, or the aforementioned Greek Yogurt.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢把它添加在谷类食品、燕麦片或者前面提到的希腊酸奶中。
